version_description: • We added another way to share Citizen with people you want to protect.
• We added another way to share Citizen with people you want to protect.
We updated the interface on incidents and viewing rich notifications is now faster and better than ever.
We updated the interface on incidents and viewing rich notifications is now faster and better than ever.
Significant performance improvements to speed and battery life.
Significant performance improvements to speed and battery life.
Significant improvements to battery life and bug fixes.
Significant improvements to battery life and bug fixes.

• You can now warn your friends about potentially dangerous incidents even if they aren’t using Citizen.
• Additional improvements to help your battery life.
• “Whoas” are now updated faster during major incidents.
• Further enhancements to

• You can now warn your friends about potentially dangerous incidents even if they aren’t using Citizen.
• Additional improvements to help your battery life.
• “Whoas” are now updated faster during major incidents.
• Further enhancements to

• We made it easier to search for friends when using "Warn Friends" on an incident.
• We made some minor UI improvements to the chat interface.
• We fixed some UI bugs that affected iPhone X users while broadcasting.

• We made it easier to search for friends when using "Warn Friends" on an incident.
• We made some minor UI improvements to the chat interface.
• We fixed some UI bugs that affected iPhone X users while broadcasting.
We made it easier and faster for new users to access the Citizen network. We also built a better way for you to invite people you want to protect.
We made it easier and faster for new users to access the Citizen network. We also built a better way for you to invite people you want to protect.
We fixed a bug that could cause users to experience a crash.
We fixed a bug that could cause users to experience a crash.

We fixed some UI issues on larger devices, made the app more stable and made it easier and faster for new users to access the Citizen network. We also built a better way for you to invite people you want to protect.

We fixed some UI issues on larger devices, made the app more stable and made it easier and faster for new users to access the Citizen network. We also built a better way for you to invite people you want to protect.

• We updated "Invite Friends" in the app menu: You can now find friends and family already using Citizen, and invite those who aren't via SMS.
• We updated our sign up flow to make it easier to find and invite friends there, as well.

• We fixed an issue that caused the feed to stop refreshing in real time.
• Some users encountered issues going live while near an incident. We made the app more responsive to your location to address these issues.
• Other bug fixes and performance

Today, Citizen is introducing a new way for you to connect with the people around you and keep your community safe.

When you open the app in one of our service areas (New York City or the San Francisco Bay Area), you’ll now see the name of the neig

• We now make smarter decisions on when to allow or disable broadcasting based on the severity of the incident. If the record button is disabled, tap on it and it will let you know why you can't go live.

BIG NEWS:
This update introduces two of our most requested features!

• Have you ever wanted to receive alerts for incidents near your home while you’re at work or school, or vice versa? (I know I have!) You can now find, follow, and receive aler

In this release, we spent time overhauling user profiles. Specifically:
• Statistics for each user are now more clearly displayed (number of videos, verified videos, and views)
• You can choose to hide specific videos from your profile

Since our last release, we’ve heard so many stories about how Citizen is helping people protect each other and stay safe but we want to hear more! If Citizen has helped you or a friend, please share your story with us at bit.ly/ProtectTheWorld or email us

INNER CIRCLE
Add all of your friends and family to your Inner Circle. You’ll get safety alerts when they are near a major crime or other emergency, and will be notified when they broadcast video.

• Remind Your Contacts: We know it’s important to have your family and friends join your Inner Circle as soon as possible. If someone you care about still hasn’t replied to your request, you can now quickly send them a reminder from the Inner Circle tab.<

NEW
• We’ve simplified the incident updates feed, removing the “stopped broadcasting” updates. This will help to quickly give you access to the most important information.
• Incidents now display the number of users notified and the number of people

NEW

• Incidents now display the number of users notified and the number of people

• When broadcasting for the for the first time, video would sometimes appear rotated 90 degrees. First impressions are important, so we’re pleased to announce we’ve fixed this bug.
• Other bug fixes and performance improvements.

• When broadcasting for the for the first time, video would sometimes appear rotated 90 degrees. First impressions are important, so we’re pleased to announce we’ve fixed this bug.
• Other bug fixes and performance improvements.

• This week we’re excited to add Baltimore to the Citizen safety network! We’ve done a lot of work getting the app ready to help you stay safe.
• Didn’t mean to broadcast? You can now remove your own videos by tapping the “...” button in the

• We fixed visual glitches across the app to give you a smoother experience.

Incident pages on Citizen now have a whole new look! Beautiful full-screen maps make it easier to navigate away from danger, and immersive vertical video will help keep you fully informed of events happening near you.

Incident pages on Citizen now have a whole new look! Beautiful full-screen maps make it easier to navigate away from danger, and immersive vertical video will help keep you fully informed of events happening near you.
This release we’re adding tab navigation to improve usability and a Notifications inbox to make it easier to find alerts that we sent you.
This release we’re adding tab navigation to improve usability and a Notifications inbox to make it easier to find alerts that we sent you.

We’ve redesigned the home screen to help you answer two key questions — "What’s going on around me?" and "Am I safe?" Our new home screen makes it easier for you to find critical information that keeps you safe and informed.

We’ve redesigned the home screen to help you answer two key questions — "What’s going on around me?" and "Am I safe?" Our new home screen makes it easier for you to find critical information that keeps you safe and informed.

- We've made it easier to get high-level views of what's happening around a city when zooming out on the new Safety Home Screen.
- You can now share individual videos.
And as always, a variety of bug fixes and performance improvements.

- We've made it easier to get high-level views of what's happening around a city when zooming out on the new Safety Home Screen.
- You can now share individual videos.
And as always, a variety of bug fixes and performance improvements.

Due to popular demand, we will once again sort incidents on the Safety Home Page by most recent.
This release also contains several bug fixes and performance improvements.

Due to popular demand, we will once again sort incidents on the Safety Home Page by most recent.
This release also contains several bug fixes and performance improvements.

You can now permanently delete your own broadcasts. Go to the Profile Tab, tap on your broadcast stats, then select 'Delete Video' on the unwanted broadcast.
This release also includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

You can now permanently delete your own broadcasts. Go to the Profile Tab, tap on your broadcast stats, then select 'Delete Video' on the unwanted broadcast.
This release also includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
Introducing a new way to connect with friends. Now you can send direct messages, see who was notified, and always know when someone you trust is nearby.
